name: Verve Hotel, An Ascend Collection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel based on the price and the reviews on this site. Although it wasn’t in Manhattan the price more than made up for this in my opinion even given the added cost of taxis/the subway to get to Manhattan.
reviews.title: Excellent value, location a consideration

reviews.text: We chose to get to the hotel by train and subway from Newark and wasn’t entirely easy. Was $90 for a taxi from Newark to Long Island and the train was around $5 each into Penn station at Madison square garden. We then got a subway to Queens plaza and spent a while wandering the streets trying to find the hotel. As a warning to anyone doing the same, the street/avenue numbers aren’t as clear as they are on Manhattan and most of the locals and even taxi drivers couldn’t even help. The building is fairly tall though and could see the Verve sign from the main road eventually.
reviews.title: excellent value

reviews.text: Check-in was excellent and the room was very comfortable and all seemed very new. The bed was large and extremely comfortable and we couldn’t fault the anything about the room.
reviews.title: A Little Verve goes a long way

reviews.text: My 24 year old daughter and I stayed at Clarion -Long Island City from Sept. 14th to 17th, 2008.
reviews.title: Great place

likes.liked: — Cleanniess, Price, quality of furnishings, location (subway to NYC), staff

reviews.text: We could not be more pleased with our stay at a suite with a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room and a great King size bed in the bed room. High quality linens, including robes. Class A bathroom supplies and a sign to ask the front desk for any necessities you may have forgot.
reviews.title: absolutely excellent

reviews.text: A minute after entering our room (at 11:00 PM), housekeeping delivered fresh sheets for the sofa bed without us thinking to ask for them.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel at half Manhattan prices just 12 mins by subway to Times Square

likes.liked: — Huge modern rooms at a great price

reviews.text: The room has a fridge and a microwave, and everything appears new.
reviews.title: An EXTREMELY Pleasant Surprise!

likes.liked: — Value, proximity to subway close to Manhattan
likes.disliked: — 3 block walk from subway through gritty neighborhood

reviews.text: Aside from the price compared to Manhattan hotels, the other great advantage is a 2 block walk to either of the two subway stops with multiple lines stopping to get you to and from Manhattan in about 10 minutes. Also the E train connects directly to JFK airport.
reviews.title: Love Staying here
Good deal for the money, but...
reviews.text: Very nice hotel, close to new york, right across the bridge (about 20min to central park on the subway)
We stayed here for 5 nights (actually still in hotel as I write this) for $169/night for a suite (the best we found in the area)
reviews.title: Good price, quality room, but area is a little desola

aka: Verve Hotel, An Ascend Collection Hotel Long Island City
description: Welcome to the Verve Hotel in Long Island City, an Ascend Collection hotel near Manhattan. Offering boutique accommodations in the heart of Long Island City, the Verve Hotel, an Ascend CollectionTM hotel, is within walking distance to Silvercup Studios film and television production facility. Local points of interest like the LaGuardia Airport, downtown Manhattan, Long Island University and the Queens Zoo are less than four miles from this Long Island City, NY hotel. John F. Kennedy International Airport and Newark Liberty International Airport are minutes away.
